item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the mainstream CEX's cumulative long liquidation strength will reach $1.292 billion
item.description: On August 19th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.292 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin surges above $117,000, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $868 million.**BlockBeats Note**: The liquidation chart does not disclose the exact number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the precise value of liquidated contracts. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the relative significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart indicates to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it reaches a specific level. A higher "liquidation bar" suggests that the price will undergo a more intense reaction due to a liquidity avalanche when it reaches that level.

item.title: Valantis Acquires HyperEVM On-Chain Liquidity Staking Platform StakedHYPE
item.description: On August 19th, as per The Block, the modular DEX protocol Valantis announced that it has acquired HyperEVM, which is the second-largest staking liquidity platform on the blockchain, StakedHYPE. The financial details of the transaction remain undisclosed.Valantis stated that the operations, development, and expansion of StakedHYPE will be managed by Valantis Labs. As part of the transaction, Addison Spiegel, the founder of Thunderhead (the entity behind StakedHYPE), will join Valantis as an advisor.StakedHYPE is the second-largest staking liquidity platform in the Hyperliquid ecosystem following Kinetiq, with a total value locked (TVL) of more than $200 million.

item.title: 1inch Introduces Native Cross-Chain Trades, Enabling Solana-EVM Asset Swaps
item.description: August 19th. As per official information, the decentralized exchange aggregator 1inch has declared the commencement of its native cross-chain exchange functionality. It now supports asset swaps between Solana and more than a dozen Ethereum EVM networks. This novel feature does not depend on a cross-chain bridge and can be utilized within the 1inch dApp, wallets, and the Fusion+ API.

item.title: Bitcoin briefly drops below $115,000
item.description: On August 19th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $115,000 and is currently trading at $115,051, with a 24-hour loss of 0.52%.

item.title: A trader has spent 4207.9 SOL on betting on the Kanye Meme Coin YZY concept, currently facing an unrealized loss of $231,000.
item.description: On August 19th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a trader spent 4207.9 SOL (approximately $767,000) in a single buy order 18 minutes ago. With this purchase, the trader bought 27.7 million YZY (Kanye West concept Meme coin) at an average cost of $0.02767 per coin. Currently, the trader is facing an unrealized loss of $231,000.

item.title: SkyBridge Founder: Maintaining Bitcoin End-of-Year Target Price of $180,000 to $200,000
item.description: On August 19th, Anthony Scaramucci, the founder of SkyBridge Capital, stated in an interview with CNBC that he maintains his year-end price target for Bitcoin to be between $180,000 and $200,000. He also touched upon this week's Wyoming Blockchain Summit, the potential next Fed chair, the current status of Bitcoin, and his perspectives on stablecoins.

item.title: Monex USA: Federal Reserve May Speed Up Interest Rate Cuts After Powell's Term
item.description: On August 19th, Monex USA indicated that after Powell's term concludes, the Federal Reserve may expedite interest rate cuts; there is a high likelihood that U.S. companies will pass on the cost of tariffs to consumers. (FX Street)

item.title: MetaMask will natively integrate the TRON network
item.description: August 19th - As per The Block, a strategic partnership agreement has been reached between TRON DAO and MetaMask. MetaMask will incorporate TRON natively within its self-hosted encrypted wallet that is developed by Consensys. This integration will enable MetaMask users to interact directly with the TRON ecosystem via the wallet interface.

item.title: Circle has announced that Circle Gateway has officially launched on the mainnet
item.description: August 19th. According to official channels, Circle has declared that a novel infrastructure, Circle Gateway, which is intended to achieve a unified cross-chain balance for USDC, has officially gone live on the mainnet. This enables users to access USDC across chains in seconds and will keep expanding to more blockchains. The key features are as follows:1. Cross-chain Access within <500ms: Instantly gain access to a unified USDC balance without the requirement of a cross-chain bridge or pre-positioned assets;2. Efficient Liquidity Management: Meet multi-chain liquidity demands through a single integration, minimizing capital utilization;3. Non-custodial Design: Users have full ownership and control of USDC, and funds can only be moved with signed authorization. Withdrawals do not require trust in a third party.

item.title: VCI Global Announces $2 Billion Partnership Through Sovereign-Grade Encryption Infrastructure
item.description: On August 19th, as per globenewswire, VCI Global Limited (with a Nasdaq code of VCIG) declared today that it has formed a partnership with a digital asset holder. Together, they have established a sovereign-level infrastructure joint venture (JV). This JV is backed by 18,000 bitcoins, which are valued at more than $21.6 billion at the current market price.Under the terms of the JV agreement, VCI Global will own 70% of the equity and take the lead in commercialization and infrastructure management. Meanwhile, its digital asset partner will maintain full custody and control over the Bitcoin reserves.
